TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but when you use your Thu'um, you lose your voice and can never speak again.

I wish the kraken had a Thu'um.

Granted, but it is mispronounced as foom. Now the kraken can kill your ships with massive G-forces.

I wish for bee bears.

Granted, but the granting fairy is on his day off.

I wish the bee joke would stop.

Granted, but you need to BEE more creative.

I wish that the earth's atmosphere wasn't polluted.

Granted. It's swarmed with bees.

I wish Thor never existed, so I could be crushed by a giant.

Granted, removing all pollutants causes the flammability of the atmosphere to increase significantly. If you light a match, a fireball happens in your hands.

Edit: Ninja'd

Granted, but his hammer stays. On your bed. You can't replace the bed and you can't sleep comfortably in it. That's what happens to forum ninjas, you see.

I wish someone would make a large image of Jebediah riding an SRB like a bull, just above Kerbin's atmosphere, looking chuffed as ever.

(Is that creative enough?)

Granted, Jeb gets stranded on the mun.

I wish an asteroid would crash land on Minmus.

Granted. Minmus crashes into itself, creating a violent wave of gamma rays. That annihilates Kerbin, every spacecraft ever, the sun, etc.

I wish Gandalf wasn't so lazy.

Granted. He's dead.

I wish it wasn't so flipping hot where I live.

Granted. It is now 200000 degrees kelvin where you live.

I wish gandalf was just an old man who smoked weed every day.

Granted, but weed gets prohibited on Middle Earth and he can't do something about it because, you know, he's just an ordinary old man who used to smoke weed every day.

I wish corrupt politicians to vanish. Now.

Granted. The purple-y, worm spreading filth from Terraria that somehow cobbled itself into a political party is gone. In its place is the bloody, spider spreading filth from Terraria that somehow cobbled itself into a political party.

I wish that mortal men could all have little magic rings.

Granted. But there's no volcano to throw the rings into, so Hitler wins WWII.

I wish for communism. The good kind.

Granted, but the corrupt politician spiders from Terraria turn it into chinese comunism: extreme capitalist economy without democratic government.

I wish for total anarchy.

Granted. The world descends into chaos and you're the first to be killed.

I wish for visible ISS passes every day.

Granted. A Soyuz lands in your living room.

I wish to be able to summon quails.

Granted, he loses all his powers to weed and becomes addicted and dies during a horrible cliff jumping accident.

I wish Bob Kerman was less scared. (he's an engineer, right? he can fix whatever breaks.)

Granted, They peck your eyes out and disembowl you

i wish that i had more knowledge and skill when it comes to modding

Granted. You mod your KSP until you totally overload your PC and burn your CPU.

I wish for a beer.

Granted. The Wishmaking Fairy gave you an intoxicated bear, which proceeds to eat you.

I wish my computer's ability to kill people was 2 exponentials of 2 more powerful.

Granted. What happens next is obvious.

I wish for a pet pillow.

Granted, you get a mysTERIous pet pillow. Also, I bite you for stealing me.

I wish the corrupt politicians turned into democrats.

Granted. All corrupt politicians become the Democratic Republic of Congo. Ouch.

I wish I could be a country, just to see what it's like.

Granted. The world is constantly yelling at you (almost literally), there are thousands, if not millions of people stepping on you painfully, and you are so shocked by what you experience that being a human will never be the same.

I wish I was a planet, just to see what it's like.

Granted. An asteroid collides with you and splits you into a million pieces, soon becoming an asteroid belt.

I wish I had a bigger ship.
